TransactionStateContext.RedeemState: Triggered when a user calls the redeem function and meets the eligibility condition.
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawState: Triggered when the owner withdraws the balance.

ExternalInteractions.Interaction: Transfers the contract balance to the owner and the sender if minimum eligibility is met.
Transfers the contract balance to the owner.
Performs an external call to an address with provided data.
